column4: So, uh, pulseaudio.  Why do I have to run "killall pulseaudio" daily, if not hourly?
pulseaudio, ahh theres another fine piece of open source engineering..
Well, I can't really blame the pulse people per se, since they didn't recommend anyone use it.
But uh, it's been a couple years, you'd think they could write a unit test or something by now.
